Blackfang: All right then. I think the bridge can be a good spot to 
start with. I just hope everything has been repaired.

He walks towards the bridge, waving Nightlight to follow him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "No I'm not"replied Nightlight "I think that I've been in stasis a 
> large time... I would rather see around..."
> 
> 
>

> > Blackfang turned to Nightlight.
> >

> > So... I told him I was going to show you around. I think I should 
> show
